column4: Is there a way to override the filepermissions to 0775 and the group to "users" in a folder for all files that are saved there?
alright, will that work for the future och is that for the present file in the folder?
You can do that any time, as long as you have the absolute or relative path to what you want right.  The switch -R means recursive, meaning it will do that to the entire directory.
